summary: This document is an email containing Lieutenant Rounds reports for August 9-10, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, listing the workstations used to complete security rounds. It appears to be routine administrative documentation from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 11, 2019, reporting on Lieutenant Rounds for August 9-10, 2019.
It lists specific computer terminals (279, 283, 236) used to log security rounds at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The correspondence is addressed to the Warden, indicating it is an internal administrative report from the facility.
